hasMenuItem.name: To Go Bag
hasMenuItem.description: As per Checkout Bag Regulations Bylaw we have to charge $.25 per bag! If you think your order needs a bag for delivery, please order one, otherwise it may come to you in many pieces! Items that you might want in a bag include starters, salads, + ice cream pints. Pizzas do not need a bag. Thank you!

review.reviewBody: First time trying this menu item, and it was just perfect. beautiful presentation, just the right amount of spicy. Will be ordering it again.
This was the best meal I've ever eaten in my life (I'm not a vegan)
The Kale Caesar Entree was pretty average. I wouldn't order it again. The Garlic Ranch Side was alright! I love Virtuous Pie so I will return but will stick to pizza next time.
This pizza is so delicious! No time for a photo! I gobbled it down so fast! Every bite made me feel so happy that I've ordered it! Virtuous Pie is fantastic!!
Who ever made my 10" Stranger Wings Pizza this time around,  thank you so much.   Absolutely delicious perfectly done.   Love it.
